description: On the login page, click the link that says 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email to receive a code. Copy and paste the code from the email to the new form that appears on the page. Update your password.
title: I forgot my password. What should I do?
description_text: On the login page, click the link that says 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email to receive a code. Copy and paste the code from the email to the new form that appears on the page. Update your password.

description: Log in to your Picovico account, go to 'Account' page and select 'Password'. Enter the required credentials to update your password and save the details.
title: How can I change my password?
description_text: Log in to your Picovico account, go to 'Account' page and select 'Password'. Enter the required credentials to update your password and save the details.

description: Yes, you can login using your Facebook or Google Plus's profile. This way, you can start using Picovico with a single click.
title: Can I login to my Picovico account via my existing social media profiles?
description_text: Yes, you can login using your Facebook or Google Plus's profile. This way, you can start using Picovico with a single click.

description: Yes, you can link your Picovico account with your Facebook account. Click on Login with Facebook while logging and enter your Facebook login details to link both the accounts. This way you can log in to Picovico using either Facebook, or your email.
title: I already have a Picovico Account, can I still login using Facebook account?
description_text: Yes, you can link your Picovico account with your Facebook account. Click on Login with Facebook while logging and enter your Facebook login details to link both the accounts. This way you can log in to Picovico using either Facebook, or your email.

description:
Follow the given steps to delete your account:

  1. Click on 'Account' in the navigation bar

  2. Among the Menu tabs, you can see an option for 'Settings', click on it.

  3. At the bottom of the page, you will see an option for Delete Account. Click the button to 'Delete'

You will be asked to specify the reason behind the deletion. As you’re done, your account will be deleted.
title: How to delete my account?
description_text:
Follow the given steps to delete your account:  
  Click on 'Account' in the navigation bar  
  Among the Menu tabs, you can see an option for 'Settings', click on it.  
  At the bottom of the page, you will see an option for Delete Account. Click the button to 'Delete'  
 You will be asked to specify the reason behind the deletion. As you’re done, your account will be deleted.
